forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers after 3pm. Cloudy, with a high near 44. Southwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers before 9pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 33. West wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

weather_report:
The morning in Boston unfolds beneath a canopy of soft, gray clouds, with the atmosphere thickening by the hour. The quiet drizzle that dances sporadically through the air is a gentle reminder of the moisture lingering in the environment, as the day unfolds toward a high that barely registers warmth. The anticipated scattered rain showers after mid-afternoon blend seamlessly into this muted landscape, with a southwest breeze that barely brushes the face—tender, yet persistent. As the clock ticks onward, the promise of evening whispers the likelihood of a cool descent into the low 30s, when the scattered showers will retreat, leaving clouds to blanket the city in a hazy embrace.

With this forecast, one might consider dressing in layers; a warm jacket paired with a reliable umbrella would be prudent companions for outings today. As the rain begins to paint the streets with a shimmering layer, possibly strolling through a local café feels just right—perhaps wrapped around a steaming cup, watching the world go by. Alternatively, a visit to an art gallery could offer a delightful refuge from the damp—a gentle engagement with creativity that invites the imagination to wander. While the day is far from crisp, there are whispers of beauty in the gray, encouraging an embrace of the understated charms of urban life, nestled just beyond the clouds.
